name: Potential Energy
description:
NOTE: Pressing [E] multiple times when speaking to someone will give more lines of dialogue! Always be sure to exhaust them all to get the full story!

A story of a bleak future and desperate people. You are the ruler of an underground colony facing open rebellion. Your power over the people has run out, and soon, so will your electricity. 

Potential Energy is a short and simple platformer with a focus on atmosphere and story. The colony is a place where power is used sparingly and darkness is in large supply. This game experiments with some lighting and focusing the gameplay and atmosphere around the sparse lights. 

Music created by Abstraction (Benjamin Burnes)
